荓字的基本解释

荓
píng
古书上说的一种草。亦称“铁扫帚”。

荓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［píng］
［《廣韻》薄經切，平青，並。］
亦作“1”。
(1)草名。又名荔草，俗名铁扫帚。叶可造纸，根可制刷。亦用以为止血、利尿药。
(2)见“荓蜂”。
[②]［pēng］
使。

荓字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　荓； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1031第18
【玉篇】同萍。【集韻】【類篇】?旁經切，音缾。草名也。【說文】馬帚也。　又同?。

【集韻】旁經切，音缾。草名。【爾雅·釋草】荓，馬帚。【疏】草似蓍，俗謂蓍荓，可爲掃彗。　又人名。【呂氏春秋】靑荓，趙人。　又【韻會】滂丁切，音俜。【詩·大雅】荓云不逮。【傳】荓，使也。【周頌】莫予荓蜂。【傳】荓蜂，?曳也。考證：〔【爾雅·釋草】荓，馬帚。【註】草似蓍。〕　謹照原文註改疏。

Nun
Basic explanation of words
Nun
píng
A kind of grass said in ancient books. Also known as "iron broom".
Nun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［píng］
["Guangyun" thin classic cut, flat green, combined. ]
Also known as "1".
(1) Cursive name. Also known as lychee, commonly known as iron broom. The leaves can be used to make paper, and the roots can be used to make brushes. It is also used to stop bleeding and diuretics.
(2) See "Xunfeng".
[②] [pēng]
Make.
Nun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　荓; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1031 Page 18
[Jade articles] Tongping. [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Side by side cut, sound bottle. The cursive name is also. [Said the text] Horse broom is also. And with?. 【Jiyun】The side sutra cut, sound bottle. Cursive name. [Erya Shicao] Nun, horse broom. 【Sparse】Grass resembles Achillea, commonly known as Achillea, can be called acne.　Another name. [Lu Shi Chun Qiu] Qian Xing, Zhao people.　[Rhyme Club] Pang Ding cut, sound. [Poetry·Daya] Xun Yun couldn't catch it. [Biography] Xun, make it. 【Zhou Song】Mo Yu Xunfeng. [Biography] Xingfeng, it's also a drag. Textual research: [[Erya·Shicao] Xun, Ma Broom. [Note] The grass is like yarrow. 〕 　 I would like to change the note based on the original text.
Nun
